description: Kush the panda was spotted in trees opposite Curraghs Wildlife Park after escaping on Wednesday.
title: Isle of Man missing red panda recaptured for second time
title_page: Isle of Man missing red panda recaptured for second time - BBC News
maintext: Mrs Graham said an investigation into how the panda escaped for a second time was still under way, but it was not thought to be a "failure in the enclosure".
